lines.text: I have not schemed and murdered to be foiled by that piece of trash!
Idiot! Imposter! Jackal! Out of my sight!

'Tis said that marriage calms the tempestuous nature. He who now watches over her as his charge would cherish her as his wife. Granted my son is not gifted in speech or manners, but he is of noble birth and as a warrior, second to none.
Did I perceive threat in the harem wench's words?
Give me not fresh irritation. When you are Caliph, you will have a carpet of maidens.
Accursed sword, can nothing move you? Donkeys! Imbeciles! Dogs! Out, out!
